Select the ingredients which you like, tap the button and get the drinks that contain them. The drinks with the max number of matches will be on the top of the list, so you always will get the most relevant search result.

On the app start screen scroll up or down, choose category of your ingredient and scroll left or right to find it on the card. Tap the ingredient you wish once to select it. Your choice will be stored to the \«Chosen ingredients\» section.
Just tap the heart on the right upper corner of the drink recipe. From this moment it is saved to your "Favourite drinks" section of the drawer menu.
No problem, just use \«Search drink\» section. Start to enter the name and the required drink will appear at once.
Open \«Chosen ingredients\» of the drawer menu, tap the ingredients you wish to clear and press the remove button. Also you can clear an each selected ingredient by tap it again on the start screen.
Select ingredients to remove from this list
